title: 16-Bit Ultimate Collection: 145 Loops
description: 145 High-Quality loops with authentic 16-bit sound design
longDescription:
This music collection features all of our 16-bit work totaling 145 original tracks! Ideal bundle for Platformers, RPGs, Fighting, Beat 'Em Ups, Puzzle, Metroidvania, Simulation, Dungeon Crawlers, and any other genre where 16-bit music will support gameplay!


All tracks are composed and produced using the highest quality retro music softwares to make our sound truly stand out.


We are a team of two, devoted to the music of retro game consoles, and hope to bring this incredible sound to you or your team's project!


LISTEN TO OUR YOUTUBE PLAYLIST HERE


SPECIFIC SAMPLER VIDEOS:

16-BIT STAGE THEME VOL 1

16-BIT STAGE THEME VOL 2

16-BIT BATTLE BUNDLE VOL 1
